comment: Dont recommended. Graded very tough. You could make a simple mistake and she would give you a 40 on a assignment. Very confusing on certain topics.
She is nice but is VERY precise. Read Everything! She can be very confusing and at some moments unsure and changes up what she says.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--Tough grader

comment: Very very tough grader, not very good at outside of class communication and is very confusing in class.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Group projects--Tough grader
